participant_1.background:

i like to try different beers from various countries.
I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
i am a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.

content.text: I am a stay at home mom of 3 young kids.
I love to try different beers from various countries.
I have a cat that loves to nap on my bed.
I love cats! I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage.
I'm far away from my sister and family.
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
It sounds like you have a busy life! How do you stay sane?
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
I am a van owner and I enjoy driving it.
I love to try different beers from various countries.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am glad you have a lot of interests!
